column5: a martial instructor to Preah Vihear Provincial Police
column6: released a video showing martial arts training for students on Facebook.------The  video posted on his Facebook page came in for some criticism by some people who thought it was a bit much to see the instructor kicking and punching the trainees.------However
column7: the trainer said that this was  an exercise in physical well-being and student stance.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/309346
